story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Buttered brings the latest food trends from Seongsu-dong, Seoul, to Chippendale
story.paragraph2:
Seongsu is currently one of Korea’s most creative neighbourhoods—known for its design studios, fashion houses, independent cafés, and a vibrant food scene. 
 We’ve captured that energy through our signature pastries like salt bread, Waterfall cake, and tissue bread. 
 These aren’t just desserts—they represent what’s trending in Korea right now, reimagined for a Sydney audience.

story2.paragraph2:
The team behind Buttered and the upcoming Hongdae Pocha also operates Allta, a contemporary Korean fine-dining restaurant in Sydney that holds 2 Hats in the Good Food Guide. 
 With Allta showcasing the refinement of Korean cuisine, Buttered and Hongdae Pocha bring that same cultural depth to everyday bakery and street food experiences.
